name: Faitoloid
description:
Faitoloid is a multiplayer fighting game with the characters of Vocaloid, such as Hatsune Miku, Kaito, Meiko, and some less known ones, like Akita Neru and Kasane Teto.
The game aims to be a simple but fun to play, with many game modes and characters.

Characters

The characters are from the world of Vocaloid, with personalities given by the community, or by us. You can play with Miku, who is fond of spring onion, or Teto, who has drills in her hair, AND on her arms.

Game modes

There are many fun game modes for you to play, from the most basic, like Deathmatch or Capture the flag, to advanced such as Fortress defender, Owned, and more!

Gameplay

You have several tools at your disposal to gain the upper hand!
You gain energy by hitting the enemies, what you can unleash in form of skills, which are different for each character.
There are several power-ups scattered across the battlefield, which aids you in battle.

Controls

Use the mouse to look around, control the movement with WASD.
LMB: attack
Hold RMB: charged attack
X: Cast skill
